SCSSdkClient.​Object.​SCSTelemetry.​PositionData
public
SCSSdkClient.​Object.​SCSTelemetry.​PositionData

Position of the Cabin, head and hook

Functions
PositionData
public PositionData()

Initialise a positionData object

Information
Cabin

This is position of the joint around which the cabin rotates.  This attribute might be not present if the vehicle does not have a separate cabin.

HeadOffset

Note that this value might change rapidly as result of the user switching between cameras or camera presets.

Properties
Cabin
public FVector Cabin { get; internal set }

Position of the cabin in the vehicle space.

Head
public FVector Head { get; internal set }

Default position of the head in the cabin space

Hook
public FVector Hook { get; internal set }

Default position of the hook in vehicle space

HeadOffset
public FPlacement HeadOffset { get; internal set }

Represents a cabin space position and orientation delta of the driver head from its default position.

CabinOffset
public FPlacement CabinOffset { get; internal set }

Represents a vehicle space position and orientation delta of the cabin from its default position.

TruckPosition
internal DPlacement TruckPosition { get; set }
HeadPositionInCabinSpace
public FVector HeadPositionInCabinSpace { get }

Position values for the Head in Cabin Space.  More interesting for the calculation head in world space.

HeadPositionInVehicleSpace
public FVector HeadPositionInVehicleSpace { get }

Head position in the Vehicle Space

HeadPositionInWorldSpace
public DVector HeadPositionInWorldSpace { get }

Head position in the World Space. Head is the Player models (viewable e.g. in camera perspective 2) head.

CabinPositionInWorlSpace
public DVector CabinPositionInWorlSpace { get }

At The MOMENT ONLY A TEST Position values of the Cabin in world space

HookPositionInWorldSpace
public DVector HookPositionInWorldSpace { get }

AT THE MOMENT ONLY A TEST Hook position of the truck in world space
